title: Spidersilk (artifact)
data:
| \[   Spidersilk (artifact)     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                      | [droven chain mail](/wiki/Droven_chain_mail "Droven chain mail")                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| Affiliation                    | - [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned")
- [hedrow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\)#dNetHack "Drow (starting race)")
- [Priest](/wiki/Priest "Priest")
- [Ranger](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger")
- [Rogue](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue")
- [Wizard](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") |
|                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| When carried                   | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| When worn                      | * +2 bonus to [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and [DR](/wiki/DR "DR")
* double spell damage for rays and beams
* unarmed attacks have [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep")-poison
* allows safe movement through [webs](/wiki/Web "Web")                                     |
| When invoked                   | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| Base price                     | 5000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Weight                         | [16](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |

**Spidersilk** is the alternate [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for [male drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\)#dNetHack "Drow (starting race)") [Priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest"), [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger"), [Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue"), and [Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is the prize for completing the [Hedrow shared quest](/index.php?title=Hedrow_shared_quest\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Hedrow shared quest (page does not exist)"). It is [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a set of [droven chain mail](/wiki/Droven_chain_mail "Droven chain mail") made of "spidersilk" [cloth](/wiki/Cloth "Cloth").

## Generation

Spidersilk can only be obtained by characters of the aforementioned race and roles that return the initial quest artifact, [Darkweaver's Cloak](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Darkweaver.27s_Cloak "DNetHack artifacts"), to their quest leader [Eclavdra](/wiki/Eclavdra "Eclavdra").

## Description

While worn, Spidersilk grants 3 base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and 4 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR"), with a +2 bonus to both status to make up for the lower protection versus standard droven chain mail. Wearing Spidersilk adds a sleep-inducing poison effect to the wearer's unarmed attacks, and grants double spell damage with ray and beam spells similar to [The Magic Mirror of Merlin](/wiki/The_Magic_Mirror_of_Merlin "The Magic Mirror of Merlin") for [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") - it also prevents the wearer from being trapped in [webs](/wiki/Web "Web"), which does not interfere with the AC bonus given by [The Black Web Entity](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\)#The_Black_Web_Entity "Spirits (dNetHack)") for being "trapped" in a web.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Spidersilk_\(artifact\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

Spidersilk (artifact)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   Spidersilk (artifact)    
Base item droven chain mail
Affiliation
  • unaligned
  • hedrow
  • Priest
  • Ranger
  • Rogue
  • Wizard
When carried none
When worn
  • +2 bonus to AC and DR
  • double spell damage for rays and beams
  • unarmed attacks have sleep-poison
  • allows safe movement through webs
When invoked none
Base price 5000 zm
Weight 16

Spidersilk is the alternate quest artifact for male drow Priests, Rangers, Rogues, and Wizards in dNetHack and notdNetHack. It is the prize for completing the Hedrow shared quest. It is unaligned, and its base item is a set of droven chain mail made of "spidersilk" cloth.

Generation

Spidersilk can only be obtained by characters of the aforementioned race and roles that return the initial quest artifact, Darkweaver's Cloak, to their quest leader Eclavdra.

Description

While worn, Spidersilk grants 3 base AC and 4 DR, with a +2 bonus to both status to make up for the lower protection versus standard droven chain mail. Wearing Spidersilk adds a sleep-inducing poison effect to the wearer's unarmed attacks, and grants double spell damage with ray and beam spells similar to The Magic Mirror of Merlin for Knights - it also prevents the wearer from being trapped in webs, which does not interfere with the AC bonus given by The Black Web Entity for being "trapped" in a web.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
